    background: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    width: 10.5px;
    height: 14px;
}

    letter-spacing: 0.3px;
    font-weight: 300;
    font-size: 10px;
    line-height: 12px;
    color: white;
}

    border-color: #d4d4d6;
    border-width: 1px 0px 1px 0px;
    border-style: solid;
    background-color: #e4e4e6;
    box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 3px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.06);
}

    border-top: none;
}

    padding: 11px 0px 11px 11px;
    height: 182px;
}

    padding-bottom: 30px;
    -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
    transform: translate3d(0,0,0);
}

    margin-left:0px;
}

    padding-right: 11px;
}

    margin-left:-4px;

}

}

    opacity: 1;
}

    transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
    opacity: 0;
}

    font-size: 15px;
    padding: 10px;
}

        <h3 class="Fw-b Fz-m Mb-2 Lh-115">
    
        <a href="https://hk.celebrity.yahoo.com/%E9%83%AD%E7%BE%A8%E5%A6%AE%E6%9C%9B%E5%9B%A1%E5%9B%A1%E8%AE%80%E6%AF%8D%E6%A0%A1-%E5%96%AE%E8%BA%AB%E5%90%91%E6%B5%B7%E5%B5%90%E5%86%87%E4%BA%BA%E8%BF%BD%E5%91%BB%E5%A4%B1%E6%95%97-083200639.html"   data-ylk="cpos:1;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:5f625067-e57c-3c93-99f9-230927c53ae2;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:hdln;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="js-stream-content-link Mend-4">郭羨妮望囡囡讀母校 單身向海嵐冇人追呻失敗<u class="Stretch"></u></a>
    </h3>
    
    <p class="Mb-2">【星島日報報道】郭羨妮（Sonija）、陳爽及向海嵐（Ann）等出席護膚品牌活動，Sonija表示最近忙於為女兒報小學，已報了10間，首選是自己母校或本地學校，其次是直資學校，最後才選擇國際學校。 她說：「我發現自己的小學入學照跟女一樣樣，嚇親，她也認同我們長得像。（叫女兒將來選港姐？）讀好書才算，但她也有表演天份，我亦不介意一家三口拍真人騷。 ...</p>

<div class="Bfc">
    <div class="Ov-h Mt-neg-1" style="max-height:5.308em;">
    
        <h3 class="Fw-b Fz-m Mb-2 Lh-115">
    
        <a href="https://hk.celebrity.yahoo.com/%E8%8B%9F%E8%8A%B8%E6%85%A7%E5%8A%A0%E6%8B%BF%E5%A4%A7%E8%A1%8C%E7%A6%AE%E5%9B%9E%E6%B8%AF%E8%A3%9C%E6%93%BA%E5%A9%9A%E5%AE%B4-222029678.html"   data-ylk="cpos:2;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:c915209e-d977-3e7c-a4a4-58340b5fba4b;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:hdln;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="js-stream-content-link Mend-4">苟芸慧加拿大行禮回港補擺婚宴<u class="Stretch"></u></a>
    </h3>
    
    <p class="Mb-2">【東方日報專訊】【陳嘉敏、劉智源米蘭直擊】苟芸慧與賽車手男友陸漢洋屢傳婚訊，靜待男友求婚的她雖然並不心急結婚，由於她的家人都在加拿大，故計劃將來婚禮在外地舉行，似乎有意選址在家鄉，之後才回港與朋友搞聚會。</p>
    </div>
    
        <div class="Fz-xs js-stream-attribution Lhh-13 D-ib Ov-h ">
            <span class="Source Whs-nw Mend-6">東方日報</span>
            
        </div>

    <li class="js-stream-content Cf Pos-r RevealNested  Px-12 Pt-10 Pb-8    "  data-uuid="ae186f43-83a2-3271-be1f-13039f128682"    >

<div class="Bfc">
    <div class="Ov-h Mt-neg-1" style="max-height:5.308em;">
    
        <h3 class="Fw-b Fz-m Mb-2 Lh-115">
    
        <a href="https://hk.celebrity.yahoo.com/%E8%83%A1%E6%9D%8F%E5%85%92%E7%88%86%E5%A7%8A%E5%A6%B9%E5%A9%9A%E6%9C%9F%E8%BF%91-222026864.html"   data-ylk="cpos:4;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:3fc5c44b-bc91-3053-afde-5fc6f651422d;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:hdln;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="js-stream-content-link Mend-4">胡杏兒爆姊妹婚期近<u class="Stretch"></u></a>
    </h3>
    
    <p class="Mb-2">【東方日報專訊】藝人張智霖（Chilam）、胡杏兒及陳瀅前晚到尖沙咀出席活動，Chilam指杏兒的樣子與太太袁詠儀（靚靚）當年快將生仔時很似：「以前杏兒好有侵略性，個樣好Sharp，依家就好溫柔。」談到「胡說八道會」幾位姊妹傳出婚訊，杏兒大爆：「快o架啦！」連Chilam都不禁追問是誰，杏兒即尷尬說：「總之快啦！」</p>
    </div>

    <li class="js-stream-content Cf Pos-r RevealNested  Px-12 Pt-10 Pb-8    "  data-uuid="5775d4f2-5b49-3539-be84-c015dd439df5"    >

<a href="https://hktravelnow.yahoo.com/%E5%95%86%E5%8B%99%E8%89%99%E4%B9%98%E5%AE%A2%E5%9B%A0bb%E5%93%AD%E8%81%B2%E5%A4%A7%E6%80%92-%E9%A3%9B%E6%A9%9F%E6%87%89%E5%90%A6%E8%A8%AD%E6%9C%89%E7%A6%81b%E5%8D%80-140613720.html" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true"   data-ylk="cpos:5;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:5775d4f2-5b49-3539-be84-c015dd439df5;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:img;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="Fl-start Mend-10 My-2 Pos-r js-stream-content-link js-stream-content-img NoTextDecoration Ov-h">
    <img src="https://s.yimg.com/os/mit/ape/m/81f43c2/t.gif" width="82" height="82" alt="商務艙乘客因BB哭聲大怒 飛機應否設有「禁B區」？" class="ImageLoader" style="background-image:url('https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/s2AjBoK936HDSPhVWnstuQ--/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMDA7cHlvZmY9MDt3PTEwMDtzbT0xO2FwcGlkPXl0YWNoeW9u/http://68.media.tumblr.com/ad22e99788ec907847070c43cd0c64ac/tumblr_inline_owmv5xQG8Z1t92yk3_1280.jpg')">



</a>

<div class="Bfc">
    <div class="Ov-h Mt-neg-1" style="max-height:5.308em;">
    
        <h3 class="Fw-b Fz-m Mb-2 Lh-115">
    
        <a href="https://hktravelnow.yahoo.com/%E5%95%86%E5%8B%99%E8%89%99%E4%B9%98%E5%AE%A2%E5%9B%A0bb%E5%93%AD%E8%81%B2%E5%A4%A7%E6%80%92-%E9%A3%9B%E6%A9%9F%E6%87%89%E5%90%A6%E8%A8%AD%E6%9C%89%E7%A6%81b%E5%8D%80-140613720.html"   data-ylk="cpos:5;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:5775d4f2-5b49-3539-be84-c015dd439df5;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:hdln;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="js-stream-content-link Mend-4">商務艙乘客因BB哭聲大怒 飛機應否設有「禁B區」？<u class="Stretch"></u></a>
    </h3>
    
    <p class="Mb-2">相信世界上有唔少人，一旅行最怕撞到就係BB。之所以喺世界唔少高級度假村都寫明禁止BB及小朋友出現，等大家耳根清靜；但另一個重災區—-飛機呢，似乎大家仍然要求神拜佛附近唔好有BB仔喎。最近台灣討論區就有人提出質疑，指自己畀咗成倍錢去坐商務艙，就係想好好咁舒適地瞓一覺；點知就撞到附近有BB，全程大喊，於是佢問：「付高額機票的商務旅客，不該被不用付費的嬰幼兒哭喊聲影響！」然後再提出，不如規定商務位係Baby-free Zone，唔可以招待任何嬰兒。雖然聽落好似好涼薄，不過估唔到得到好多網民支持，認為坐商務理應有更優質服務，無理由被騷擾，任可理由都唔可以接受。但當然亦有唔少BB護航者，提出大愛包容論，例如「你未做過BB仔咩？」「咁迫成人都頂唔順，何況BB？」等等。其實航空公司以人道理由，無可能拒絕BB上機，但其實商務艙全面禁B，其實又可能可以考慮一下架！</p>
    </div>
    
        <div class="Fz-xs js-stream-attribution Lhh-13 D-ib Ov-h ">
            <span class="Source Whs-nw Mend-6">Yahoo Travel HK</span>
            
        </div>
    
    
    
    
        <ul class="social-sharing-container Pos-a Fz-m C-w D-n End-0" data-title="商務艙乘客因BB哭聲大怒 飛機應否設有「禁B區」？" data-image="https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/MeYzOWXVUMgVAoS4WVpOqA--/aD05NjA7dz0xMjgwO3NtPTE7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/http://68.media.tumblr.com/ad22e99788ec907847070c43cd0c64ac/tumblr_inline_owmv5xQG8Z1t92yk3_1280.jpg" data-summary="相信世界上有唔少人，一旅行最怕撞到就係BB。之所以喺世界唔少高級度假村都寫明禁止BB及小朋友出現，等大家耳根清靜；但另一個重災區—-飛機呢，似乎大家仍然要求神拜佛附近唔好有BB仔喎。最近台灣討論區就有人提出質疑，指自己畀咗成倍錢去坐商務艙，就係想好好咁舒適地瞓一覺；點知就撞到附近有BB，全程大喊，於是佢問：「付高額機票的商務旅客，不該被不用付費的嬰幼兒哭喊聲影響！」然後再提出，不如規定商務位係Baby-free Zone，唔可以招待任何嬰兒。雖然聽落好似好涼薄，不過估唔到得到好多網民支持，認為坐商務理應有更優質服務，無理由被騷擾，任可理由都唔可以接受。但當然亦有唔少BB護航者，提出大愛包容論，例如「你未做過BB仔咩？」「咁迫成人都頂唔順，何況BB？」等等。其實航空公司以人道理由，無可能拒絕BB上機，但其實商務艙全面禁B，其實又可能可以考慮一下架！" data-link="https://hktravelnow.yahoo.com/%E5%95%86%E5%8B%99%E8%89%99%E4%B9%98%E5%AE%A2%E5%9B%A0bb%E5%93%AD%E8%81%B2%E5%A4%A7%E6%80%92-%E9%A3%9B%E6%A9%9F%E6%87%89%E5%90%A6%E8%A8%AD%E6%9C%89%E7%A6%81b%E5%8D%80-140613720.html"><li class="D-ib Mstart-2 Cur-p"><a href="#0" class="tumblr-button Icon IconLogoTumblr C-w Td-n P-4"   data-ylk="cpos:5;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:share;g:5775d4f2-5b49-3539-be84-c015dd439df5;ct:1;pkgt:4;sec:strm;slk:tumblr;elm:btn;elmt:sh-tbr;itc:1;"></a></li><li class="D-ib Mstart-2 Cur-p"><a href="#0" class="facebook-button Icon IconLogoFacebook C-w Td-n P-4"   data-ylk="cpos:5;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:share;g:5775d4f2-5b49-3539-be84-c015dd439df5;ct:1;pkgt:4;sec:strm;slk:facebook;elm:btn;elmt:sh-fb;itc:1;"></a></li></ul>

    <li class="js-stream-content Cf Pos-r RevealNested      "  data-uuid="073cf8de-7807-3241-b598-e292cb48d20f"    ><a href="https://hk.style.yahoo.com/%E4%BD%A0%E8%A6%81%E6%B6%88%E8%84%82-%E6%B8%9B%E7%A3%85%E6%88%96%E9%8D%9B%E9%8D%8A%E8%82%8C%E8%82%89-%E5%80%8B%E6%9C%89%E6%95%88%E7%9A%84%E8%B7%91%E6%AD%A5%E6%B8%9B%E8%82%A5%E6%96%B9%E6%B3%95-033000764.html" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true"   data-ylk="cpos:7;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:073cf8de-7807-3241-b598-e292cb48d20f;ct:1;pkgt:5;elm:img;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;slk:你要消脂、減磅或鍛鍊肌肉？３個有效的跑步減肥方法;" class="Fl-end W-50 Pos-r js-stream-content-link js-stream-content-img NoTextDecoration" style="max-width:300px">
    <span class="D-b BackgroundPic ImageLoader" style="height:169px;background-image:url('https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/rh9fJQimAGaPT0Ouw0ndpQ--/aD01Nzg7dz04ODU7c209MTthcHBpZD15dGFjaHlvbg--/https://www.elle.com.hk/var/ellehk/storage/images/beauty_and_health/diet_fitness/3-running-method-for-losing-weight/23690873-1-chi-HK/_1_img_885_590.jpg');"></span>


</a>
<div class="Bfc Py-8 Pstart-12 Pend-20">
    
    <h3 class="Fw-b Fz-l Mb-2 Lh-12 Ov-h" style="max-height:4.667em">
        <a href="https://hk.style.yahoo.com/%E4%BD%A0%E8%A6%81%E6%B6%88%E8%84%82-%E6%B8%9B%E7%A3%85%E6%88%96%E9%8D%9B%E9%8D%8A%E8%82%8C%E8%82%89-%E5%80%8B%E6%9C%89%E6%95%88%E7%9A%84%E8%B7%91%E6%AD%A5%E6%B8%9B%E8%82%A5%E6%96%B9%E6%B3%95-033000764.html"   data-ylk="cpos:7;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:073cf8de-7807-3241-b598-e292cb48d20f;ct:1;pkgt:5;elm:hdln;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="js-stream-content-link Mend-4">你要消脂、減磅或鍛鍊肌肉？３個有效的跑步減肥方法<u class="Stretch"></u></a>
    </h3>
    <p class="Mb-2 LineClamp-3">跑步減肥聽起來是雞與雞蛋 ，跑步的里數愈多，卡路里便消耗得愈多。實情是當你愈跑愈多，身體自然需要從更多食物中攝取更多營養，減低在跑市時出現的慢性疲勞及受傷，換言之，跑得多也會令身體吃得更多，距離減肥計劃又遠一步。</p>
    
    <div class="Fz-xs js-stream-attribution Lhh-13 D-ib Ov-h">
        <span class="Source Whs-nw Mend-6">ELLE.com.hk</span>
        
    </div>
    
    
        <ul class="social-sharing-container Pos-a Fz-m C-w D-n End-0" data-title="你要消脂、減磅或鍛鍊肌肉？３個有效的跑步減肥方法" data-image="https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/rh9fJQimAGaPT0Ouw0ndpQ--/aD01Nzg7dz04ODU7c209MTthcHBpZD15dGFjaHlvbg--/https://www.elle.com.hk/var/ellehk/storage/images/beauty_and_health/diet_fitness/3-running-method-for-losing-weight/23690873-1-chi-HK/_1_img_885_590.jpg" data-summary="跑步減肥聽起來是雞與雞蛋 ，跑步的里數愈多，卡路里便消耗得愈多。實情是當你愈跑愈多，身體自然需要從更多食物中攝取更多營養，減低在跑市時出現的慢性疲勞及受傷，換言之，跑得多也會令身體吃得更多，距離減肥計劃又遠一步。" data-link="https://hk.style.yahoo.com/%E4%BD%A0%E8%A6%81%E6%B6%88%E8%84%82-%E6%B8%9B%E7%A3%85%E6%88%96%E9%8D%9B%E9%8D%8A%E8%82%8C%E8%82%89-%E5%80%8B%E6%9C%89%E6%95%88%E7%9A%84%E8%B7%91%E6%AD%A5%E6%B8%9B%E8%82%A5%E6%96%B9%E6%B3%95-033000764.html"><li class="D-ib Mstart-2 Cur-p"><a href="#0" class="tumblr-button Icon IconLogoTumblr C-w Td-n P-4"   data-ylk="cpos:7;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:share;g:073cf8de-7807-3241-b598-e292cb48d20f;ct:1;pkgt:4;sec:strm;slk:tumblr;elm:btn;elmt:sh-tbr;itc:1;"></a></li><li class="D-ib Mstart-2 Cur-p"><a href="#0" class="facebook-button Icon IconLogoFacebook C-w Td-n P-4"   data-ylk="cpos:7;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:share;g:073cf8de-7807-3241-b598-e292cb48d20f;ct:1;pkgt:4;sec:strm;slk:facebook;elm:btn;elmt:sh-fb;itc:1;"></a></li></ul>

<div class="Bfc">
    <div class="Ov-h Mt-neg-1" style="max-height:5.308em;">
    
        <h3 class="Fw-b Fz-m Mb-2 Lh-115">
    
        <a href="https://hk.finance.yahoo.com/news/%E6%9C%89%E5%9C%96%E6%9C%89%E7%9C%9F%E7%9B%B8-%E9%BA%A5%E7%95%B6%E5%8B%9E%E7%95%B6office%E8%80%8C%E4%B8%8D%E5%A4%B1%E9%9C%B8%E6%B0%A3-034630102.html"   data-ylk="cpos:8;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:2bbf3ec9-deae-31dc-a508-8666d56084b3;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:hdln;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="js-stream-content-link Mend-4">【有圖有真相】麥當勞當Office而不失霸氣<u class="Stretch"></u></a>
    </h3>
    
    <p class="Mb-2">幾時都話，依家打工仔愈來愈難撈，唔只Office座位愈劏愈細，有時仲慘到將成個辦公室位由office移植到連鎖食肆。 近日有網民就在社交媒體上載咗呢一幅學生跌膊自修圖，用一杯唔知飲咗幾耐的可樂，一連霸住兩張枱⋯⋯</p>

<div class="Bfc">
    <div class="Ov-h Mt-neg-1" style="max-height:5.308em;">
    
        <h3 class="Fw-b Fz-m Mb-2 Lh-115">
    
        <a href="https://hk.finance.yahoo.com/news/%E5%A4%96%E5%9C%8B%E4%B8%AD%E7%8D%8E%E5%80%8B%E6%A1%88%EF%BC%9A%E5%94%94%E4%B8%AD%E5%85%AD%E5%90%88%E5%BD%A9%E6%9C%83%E6%9B%B4%E5%A5%BD-121138411.html"   data-ylk="cpos:9;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:981c2777-1ca2-38fa-820d-017d698c53ee;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:hdln;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="js-stream-content-link Mend-4">外國中獎個案：唔中六合彩會更好<u class="Stretch"></u></a>
    </h3>
    
    <p class="Mb-2">中秋金多寶今日開售，傳媒又例牌寫文教你致富。有媒體教人「兩招」捧走彩金，一招係排隊買飛，另一招係盡買複式，同股壇大師貼士一樣，有網民好奇，點解有秘笈都要教你，有人就話，其實都無乜嘢秘技。發達的確一命二運三風水，財要來時自有方。而有時候，發達才是悲慘故事的開始。</p>

<div class="Bfc Py-8 Pstart-12 Pend-20">
    
    <h3 class="Fw-b Fz-l Mb-2 Lh-12 Ov-h" style="max-height:4.667em">
        <a href="https://hk.finance.yahoo.com/news/%E8%B2%B7%E6%9D%91%E5%B1%8B3%E5%A4%A7%E8%80%83%E6%85%AE-%E5%94%94%E7%90%86%E5%B0%B1%E5%A5%BD%E6%98%93%E8%9D%95%E5%85%A5%E8%82%89-110351729.html"   data-ylk="cpos:10;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:e1862eb3-fa17-3ec1-97d4-de3d0ef1d74d;ct:1;pkgt:5;elm:hdln;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="js-stream-content-link Mend-4">【置業攻略】買村屋3大考慮 唔理就好易蝕入肉<u class="Stretch"></u></a>
    </h3>
    <p class="Mb-2 LineClamp-3">樓價高企，最近不少網友問到一些另類選擇，例如村屋。很多藝人、外國人都喜歡住村屋，貪私隱度高，環境舒適。識揀可以住得舒適，賺得招積，唔識揀，確實很容易中伏！</p>
    
    <div class="Fz-xs js-stream-attribution Lhh-13 D-ib Ov-h">
        <span class="Source Whs-nw Mend-6">經濟一週</span>
        
    </div>

    <li class="js-stream-content Cf Pos-r RevealNested  Px-12 Pt-10 Pb-8    "  data-uuid="f87d1e35-28ad-3775-8a8f-336043d94936"    >

<a href="https://hk.news.yahoo.com/%E6%97%A5%E5%B9%A3%E8%B7%8C%E5%8F%AF%E6%9C%9B%E7%9C%8B%E5%88%B00-26-%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E6%97%85%E9%81%8A%E6%84%9B%E5%A5%BD%E8%80%85%E6%8A%8A%E6%8F%A1%E6%A9%9F%E6%9C%83-032000125.html" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true"   data-ylk="cpos:11;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:f87d1e35-28ad-3775-8a8f-336043d94936;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:img;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="Fl-start Mend-10 My-2 Pos-r js-stream-content-link js-stream-content-img NoTextDecoration Ov-h">
    <img src="https://s.yimg.com/os/mit/ape/m/81f43c2/t.gif" width="82" height="82" alt="日幣跌可望看到0.26 日本旅遊愛好者把握機會" class="ImageLoader" style="background-image:url('https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/utpGENbyE2ce070Ju0CC2Q--/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMDA7cHlvZmY9MDt3PTEwMDtzbT0xO2FwcGlkPXl0YWNoeW9u/http://media.zenfs.com/zh-Hant-Hk/homerun/mook__193/ae8605f4d0d019b781f72ab91a62a47f')">



</a>

<div class="Bfc">
    <div class="Ov-h Mt-neg-1" style="max-height:5.308em;">
    
        <h3 class="Fw-b Fz-m Mb-2 Lh-115">
    
        <a href="https://hk.news.yahoo.com/%E6%97%A5%E5%B9%A3%E8%B7%8C%E5%8F%AF%E6%9C%9B%E7%9C%8B%E5%88%B00-26-%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E6%97%85%E9%81%8A%E6%84%9B%E5%A5%BD%E8%80%85%E6%8A%8A%E6%8F%A1%E6%A9%9F%E6%9C%83-032000125.html"   data-ylk="cpos:11;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:f87d1e35-28ad-3775-8a8f-336043d94936;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:hdln;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="js-stream-content-link Mend-4">日幣跌可望看到0.26 日本旅遊愛好者把握機會<u class="Stretch"></u></a>
    </h3>
    
    <p class="Mb-2">文／MOOK景點家整理報導 又到了賞楓的季節，不少人也在規劃中秋、國慶連假出國度假，最近要赴日旅遊者不妨趁近期日幣走跌的時機，先抓好兌換日圓的時間點，提早兌換日幣。   日幣9月8日之後一路走跌。(圖／MOOK景點家) 日幣自9月8日之後一路走跌，買入價0.2655，賣出價0.2728(參考永豐商業銀行牌價)，是近兩個月來的新低，上次低點在7月11日，低於0.265。日幣已經跌了一個禮拜，近期打算赴日旅遊者不妨看準時間先將日幣兌換好，為旅遊購物精打細算。   日本超商必搶甜點 GODIVA蛋糕捲再推第三彈 》http://www.mook.com.tw/article.php?op=articleinfo&articleid=16297  </p>
    </div>
    
        <div class="Fz-xs js-stream-attribution Lhh-13 D-ib Ov-h ">
            <span class="Source Whs-nw Mend-6">MOOK景點家</span>
            
        </div>

<a href="https://hk.celebrity.yahoo.com/%E6%9E%97%E4%BD%9C%E5%BF%83%E6%9C%89%E6%89%80%E5%B1%AC%E5%94%94%E6%95%A2%E8%A6%8B%E5%A5%B3%E7%A5%9E-222024139.html" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true"   data-ylk="cpos:12;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:3a460eac-a55a-30e2-b40b-daf56ca713b5;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:img;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="Fl-start Mend-10 My-2 Pos-r js-stream-content-link js-stream-content-img NoTextDecoration Ov-h">

<div class="Bfc">
    <div class="Ov-h Mt-neg-1" style="max-height:5.308em;">
    
        <h3 class="Fw-b Fz-m Mb-2 Lh-115">
    
        <a href="https://hk.celebrity.yahoo.com/%E6%9E%97%E4%BD%9C%E5%BF%83%E6%9C%89%E6%89%80%E5%B1%AC%E5%94%94%E6%95%A2%E8%A6%8B%E5%A5%B3%E7%A5%9E-222024139.html"   data-ylk="cpos:12;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:3a460eac-a55a-30e2-b40b-daf56ca713b5;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:hdln;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="js-stream-content-link Mend-4">林作心有所屬唔敢見女神<u class="Stretch"></u></a>
    </h3>
    
    <p class="Mb-2">【東方日報專訊】林作前晚到尖沙咀出席活動，提到賭王何鴻燊四太梁安琪早前表示想兒子何猷亨與麥明詩拍拖，身為麥明詩舊愛的林作自言沒追新聞，不過很喜歡四太：「佢講嘢超正，同佢幾好傾，我哋啱傾過佢同佢個仔。（猷亨追麥明詩會酸溜溜嗎？）唔夠膽答，全部都好朋友。」</p>
    </div>
    
        <div class="Fz-xs js-stream-attribution Lhh-13 D-ib Ov-h ">
            <span class="Source Whs-nw Mend-6">東方日報</span>

    <li class="js-stream-content Cf Pos-r RevealNested  Px-12 Pt-10 Pb-8    "  data-uuid="7c7e3c0b-0b57-3bb1-bd73-fb8c36994ba0"    >

<div class="Bfc">
    <div class="Ov-h Mt-neg-1" style="max-height:4.077em;;">
    
        <h3 class="Fw-b Fz-m Mb-2 Lh-115">
    
        <a href="https://hkstylemen.yahoo.com/%E6%B2%92%E9%8C%A2%E8%B2%B7-game-switch-%E7%AB%9F%E5%85%A7%E7%BD%AE%E9%9A%B1%E8%97%8F%E9%81%8A%E6%88%B2-080831860.html"   data-ylk="cpos:13;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:7c7e3c0b-0b57-3bb1-bd73-fb8c36994ba0;ct:1;pkgt:3;elm:hdln;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="js-stream-content-link Mend-4">沒錢買 Game ?? Switch 竟內置隱藏遊戲<u class="Stretch"></u></a>
    </h3>
    
    <p class="Mb-2">Nintendo 推出新遊戲主機 Switch，市場反應很好，畢竟玩法多樣化。 有時候我們帶著 Switch 的時候，一個不小心便會漏帶遊戲卡帶，到時得物無所用。不過原來 Nintendo Switch 居然本身已內置了遊戲！日前有一名為 Yellows8 的程式員發現 Switch 中有一個名為 “flog” 的系統，而這個系統要通過 Root 機後才能打開，原來這個遊戲是 Nintendo 於 1984 推出的運動類遊戲 GOLF。 分析指 flog 系統理論上是一個超任模擬器，早已從 Switch 零售版的 1.0 版系統軟件已經開始預載，而且這個遊戲的 ROM 並是不獨立存在，而是藏於模擬器的程式碼當中。 目前為止 Yellows8 除只能 Root 機之外，曾嘗試以其他方法試圖打開，不過仍然未成功。大家可能自己試一試能否解開這個謎。。。 此文章原刊於 Qooah.com 為您推薦更多相關文章： Switch 有得玩《無雙》系列了，而且更是三連發！ 任天堂將攻入VR發展？Nintendo Switch韌體出現「VR模式」編碼字串</p>
    </div>
    
        <div class="Fz-xs js-stream-attribution Lhh-13 D-ib Ov-h ">
            <span class="Source Whs-nw Mend-6">Qooah.com</span>
            
        </div>
    
    
    
    
        <ul class="social-sharing-container Pos-a Fz-m C-w D-n End-0" data-title="沒錢買 Game ??     <li class="js-stream-content Cf Pos-r RevealNested      "  data-uuid="2ee87cf1-0b20-3201-a15a-9d270c3ba9be"    ><a href="https://hk.style.yahoo.com/%E6%9C%89%E5%B9%BD%E9%BB%98%E6%84%9F%E7%9A%84%E8%80%81%E5%85%AC%E5%AB%81%E5%BE%97%E9%81%8E-ryan-reynolds-%E5%A4%AB%E5%A9%A6%E7%9A%84%E8%88%89%E5%8B%95%E9%80%97%E6%A8%82%E6%89%80%E6%9C%89%E4%BA%BA-033100365.html" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true"   data-ylk="cpos:14;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:2ee87cf1-0b20-3201-a15a-9d270c3ba9be;ct:1;pkgt:5;elm:img;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;slk:有幽默感的老公嫁得過，Ryan Reynolds 夫婦的舉動逗樂所有人;" class="Fl-end W-50 Pos-r js-stream-content-link js-stream-content-img NoTextDecoration" style="max-width:300px">

<div class="Bfc Py-8 Pstart-12 Pend-20">
    
    <h3 class="Fw-b Fz-l Mb-2 Lh-12 Ov-h" style="max-height:4.667em">
        <a href="https://hk.style.yahoo.com/%E6%9C%89%E5%B9%BD%E9%BB%98%E6%84%9F%E7%9A%84%E8%80%81%E5%85%AC%E5%AB%81%E5%BE%97%E9%81%8E-ryan-reynolds-%E5%A4%AB%E5%A9%A6%E7%9A%84%E8%88%89%E5%8B%95%E9%80%97%E6%A8%82%E6%89%80%E6%9C%89%E4%BA%BA-033100365.html"   data-ylk="cpos:14;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:2ee87cf1-0b20-3201-a15a-9d270c3ba9be;ct:1;pkgt:5;elm:hdln;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="js-stream-content-link Mend-4">有幽默感的老公嫁得過，Ryan Reynolds 夫婦的舉動逗樂所有人<u class="Stretch"></u></a>
    </h3>
    <p class="Mb-2 LineClamp-3">Ryan Reynolds 和 Blake Lively 是荷里活公認的可愛夫婦，兩人經常孖公仔出席活動，出雙入對大放甜蜜閃光彈，更不介意在鏡頭下展露兩人相處的真性情，讚美對方之餘更不失幽默感，絕對是模範夫婦，羨煞旁人！</p>
    
    <div class="Fz-xs js-stream-attribution Lhh-13 D-ib Ov-h">
        <span class="Source Whs-nw Mend-6">Harper&#39;s Bazaar</span>
        
    </div>
    
    
        <ul class="social-sharing-container Pos-a Fz-m C-w D-n End-0" data-title="有幽默感的老公嫁得過，Ryan Reynolds 夫婦的舉動逗樂所有人" data-image="https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/4jEe8yOJ1VVKYyZNUsnmDA--/aD0yNTA7dz02NDA7c209MTthcHBpZD15dGFjaHlvbg--/http://media.zenfs.com/zh-Hant-HK/homerun/harpersbazaar.com/b9aca7ab33ce3c16c510c3b9d65c84bc" data-summary="Ryan Reynolds 和 Blake Lively 是荷里活公認的可愛夫婦，兩人經常孖公仔出席活動，出雙入對大放甜蜜閃光彈，更不介意在鏡頭下展露兩人相處的真性情，讚美對方之餘更不失幽默感，絕對是模範夫婦，羨煞旁人！" data-link="https://hk.style.yahoo.com/%E6%9C%89%E5%B9%BD%E9%BB%98%E6%84%9F%E7%9A%84%E8%80%81%E5%85%AC%E5%AB%81%E5%BE%97%E9%81%8E-ryan-reynolds-%E5%A4%AB%E5%A9%A6%E7%9A%84%E8%88%89%E5%8B%95%E9%80%97%E6%A8%82%E6%89%80%E6%9C%89%E4%BA%BA-033100365.html"><li class="D-ib Mstart-2 Cur-p"><a href="#0" class="tumblr-button Icon IconLogoTumblr C-w Td-n P-4"   data-ylk="cpos:14;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:share;g:2ee87cf1-0b20-3201-a15a-9d270c3ba9be;ct:1;pkgt:4;sec:strm;slk:tumblr;elm:btn;elmt:sh-tbr;itc:1;"></a></li><li class="D-ib Mstart-2 Cur-p"><a href="#0" class="facebook-button Icon IconLogoFacebook C-w Td-n P-4"   data-ylk="cpos:14;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:share;g:2ee87cf1-0b20-3201-a15a-9d270c3ba9be;ct:1;pkgt:4;sec:strm;slk:facebook;elm:btn;elmt:sh-fb;itc:1;"></a></li></ul>

    <li class="js-stream-content Cf Pos-r RevealNested  Px-12 Pt-10 Pb-8    "  data-uuid="7e0e60cc-0658-33b2-8ed2-fb600dcf083c"    >

<a href="https://hk.style.yahoo.com/%E8%87%89%E4%B8%8A%E6%9C%89%E9%80%99%E4%B8%89%E5%80%8B%E6%A8%99%E8%AA%8C%E6%98%AF%E7%B5%95%E5%B0%8D%E7%9A%84%E5%AF%8C%E8%B2%B4%E7%9B%B8-110752979.html" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true"   data-ylk="cpos:15;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:7e0e60cc-0658-33b2-8ed2-fb600dcf083c;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:img;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="Fl-start Mend-10 My-2 Pos-r js-stream-content-link js-stream-content-img NoTextDecoration Ov-h">
    <img src="https://s.yimg.com/os/mit/ape/m/81f43c2/t.gif" width="82" height="82" alt="臉上有這三個標誌，是絕對的富貴相！" class="ImageLoader" style="background-image:url('https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/6clhy_YnhILBFpOwH7_BpA--/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMDA7cHlvZmY9MDt3PTEwMDtzbT0xO2FwcGlkPXl0YWNoeW9u/http://68.media.tumblr.com/aba1e13c8cc987454778160a2033eabd/tumblr_inline_owixl50mCd1u41zut_1280.jpg')">



</a>

<div class="Bfc">
    <div class="Ov-h Mt-neg-1" style="max-height:5.308em;">
    
        <h3 class="Fw-b Fz-m Mb-2 Lh-115">
    
        <a href="https://hk.style.yahoo.com/%E8%87%89%E4%B8%8A%E6%9C%89%E9%80%99%E4%B8%89%E5%80%8B%E6%A8%99%E8%AA%8C%E6%98%AF%E7%B5%95%E5%B0%8D%E7%9A%84%E5%AF%8C%E8%B2%B4%E7%9B%B8-110752979.html"   data-ylk="cpos:15;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:7e0e60cc-0658-33b2-8ed2-fb600dcf083c;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:hdln;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="js-stream-content-link Mend-4">臉上有這三個標誌，是絕對的富貴相！<u class="Stretch"></u></a>
    </h3>
    
    <p class="Mb-2">如果頭型偏圓潤，沒有明顯的凹陷（如兩腮深凹等）、尖長（如下巴尖薄等），額頭高且飽滿的女性，在財運上比較旺盛，很容易有一些賺錢的良機，如果能適時把握，在財運上便可年年有餘，衣食無憂，有這樣面相的女子屬於相夫教子的女性，與此同時，還會對丈夫的事業和財運有所促進，這也是大富大貴，旺夫相的特徵。星相資訊由熱新聞提供原文連結: 臉上有這三個標誌，財神爺主動找上門，發大財行好運，絕對的富貴相!更多相關內容害怕愛人出軌？很可能是家裡風水出了問題！靈機文化靈機文化是目前全球華人區知名的傳統文化整合傳播平台，已累計為48個國家及華人地區，超過1億用戶提供專業服務，開發的專業應用過百個，涵括易學工具，生活指導，專業服務等多方面，拳頭產品應用有靈機妙算、順曆、修行者，下載量均高居同類應用前列。另有微信公眾號：靈機文化，fb：靈機文化，每天提供最新最全的命理資訊，歡迎關注我们。</p>
    </div>
    
        <div class="Fz-xs js-stream-attribution Lhh-13 D-ib Ov-h ">
            <span class="Source Whs-nw Mend-6">Yesnews Style</span>
            
        </div>

<div class="Bfc ">
    
    <h3 class="Mb-4 Lh-1 Ov-h">
        <a href="https://hk.news.yahoo.com/video/%E5%B0%96%E6%B2%99%E5%92%80-%E9%96%93%E9%87%91%E8%A1%8C%E8%A2%AB%E5%8A%AB%E5%8D%83%E8%90%AC%E5%85%83%E9%A3%BE%E7%89%A9-035600650.html"   data-ylk="cpos:16;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:c9b73c24-26e7-37b7-b315-496cfe35bea2;ct:3;pkgt:111;elm:hdln;elmt:ct;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="js-stream-content-link js-stream-item-title Mend-40 Fz-m Fw-b Lh-114 LineClamp-3" style="max-height:5.4rem;">尖沙咀一間金行被劫千萬元飾物<u class="Stretch"></u></a>
    </h3>
    
    <p class="Mb-4 LineClamp-3">【Now新聞台】尖沙咀廣東道一間金行被三名非華裔賊人，持鐵鎚劫去總值約一千萬元飾物。 現場是廣東道三十號新港中心地下周生生珠寶金行，面向行人路的櫥窗被賊人擊穿。 上午約九時三十分，三名賊人被發現坐一部電單車到達金行門外，其中兩人持鐵鎚落車，向櫥窗連擊三次後伸手劫走一批飾物，然後乘電單車逃去，準備開門營業的職員發現即致電報案。 警方表示翻查閉路電視後，正通緝三名非華裔男子下落，而金行職員經點算後，初步損失約一千萬元。 ＃要聞</p>
    <div class="Fz-xs js-stream-attribution Lhh-13 D-i Ov-h">
        
        <span class="Source Whs-nw Mend-6">now.com 影音新聞</span>
        
        
    </div>
    
        <ul class="social-sharing-container Pos-a Fz-m C-w D-n End-0" data-title="尖沙咀一間金行被劫千萬元飾物" data-image="https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/G1mSypLWVPnl.Wisc_NTuA--/aD04MDt3PTEwMDtzbT0xO2FwcGlkPXl0YWNoeW9u/http://d.yimg.com/hd/hknownews/3/9/data_S2UeHZiSNVhWfCotMGcj6hpgmZFJOh1xRXnXVwPZ6gRRudgxFI95eIthUF-Wn6ed6rqOGyO4dbg-~A_0_0.jpg?s=517b43d601dbc0a4754edadd4537afb7&amp;c=4e7085cc28e321c64dd39371e8bc2987&amp;a=hknownews&amp;mr=0" data-summary="【Now新聞台】尖沙咀廣東道一間金行被三名非華裔賊人，持鐵鎚劫去總值約一千萬元飾物。 現場是廣東道三十號新港中心地下周生生珠寶金行，面向行人路的櫥窗被賊人擊穿。 上午約九時三十分，三名賊人被發現坐一部電單車到達金行門外，其中兩人持鐵鎚落車，向櫥窗連擊三次後伸手劫走一批飾物，然後乘電單車逃去，準備開門營業的職員發現即致電報案。 警方表示翻查閉路電視後，正通緝三名非華裔男子下落，而金行職員經點算後，初步損失約一千萬元。 ＃要聞" data-link="https://hk.news.yahoo.com/video/%E5%B0%96%E6%B2%99%E5%92%80-%E9%96%93%E9%87%91%E8%A1%8C%E8%A2%AB%E5%8A%AB%E5%8D%83%E8%90%AC%E5%85%83%E9%A3%BE%E7%89%A9-035600650.html"><li class="D-ib Mstart-2 Cur-p"><a href="#0" class="tumblr-button Icon IconLogoTumblr C-w Td-n P-4"   data-ylk="cpos:16;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:share;g:c9b73c24-26e7-37b7-b315-496cfe35bea2;ct:3;pkgt:4;sec:strm;slk:tumblr;elm:btn;elmt:sh-tbr;itc:1;"></a></li><li class="D-ib Mstart-2 Cur-p"><a href="#0" class="facebook-button Icon IconLogoFacebook C-w Td-n P-4"   data-ylk="cpos:16;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:share;g:c9b73c24-26e7-37b7-b315-496cfe35bea2;ct:3;pkgt:4;sec:strm;slk:facebook;elm:btn;elmt:sh-fb;itc:1;"></a></li></ul>

    <li class="js-stream-content Cf Pos-r RevealNested  Px-12 Pt-10 Pb-8    "  data-uuid="1855bf05-e469-3dc3-89f8-d077cf900c73"    >

<a href="https://hk.style.yahoo.com/%E6%96%B9%E4%B8%AD%E4%BF%A1%E7%9B%9B%E8%AE%9A%E6%95%99%E5%A5%B3%E6%9C%89%E6%96%B9-%E8%8E%AB%E5%8F%AF%E6%AC%A3-%E8%91%97%E9%87%8D%E8%BA%AB%E6%95%99-%E5%AD%B8%E6%9C%83%E5%B0%8A%E9%87%8D%E7%94%9F%E5%91%BD-092133430.html" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true"   data-ylk="cpos:17;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:1855bf05-e469-3dc3-89f8-d077cf900c73;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:img;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="Fl-start Mend-10 My-2 Pos-r js-stream-content-link js-stream-content-img NoTextDecoration Ov-h">
    <img src="https://s.yimg.com/os/mit/ape/m/81f43c2/t.gif" width="82" height="82" alt="方中信盛讚教女有方 莫可欣 著重身教 學會尊重生命" class="ImageLoader" style="background-image:url('https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/UyqK0g82AjErVeS_ADgR.Q--/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMDA7cHlvZmY9MDt3PTEwMDtzbT0xO2FwcGlkPXl0YWNoeW9u/http://media.zenfs.com/zh-Hant-HK/homerun/sunday_kiss_359/678a1d6d7731463cde7c6a60299904d0')">



</a>

<div class="Bfc">
    <div class="Ov-h Mt-neg-1" style="max-height:5.308em;">
    
        <h3 class="Fw-b Fz-m Mb-2 Lh-115">
    
        <a href="https://hk.style.yahoo.com/%E6%96%B9%E4%B8%AD%E4%BF%A1%E7%9B%9B%E8%AE%9A%E6%95%99%E5%A5%B3%E6%9C%89%E6%96%B9-%E8%8E%AB%E5%8F%AF%E6%AC%A3-%E8%91%97%E9%87%8D%E8%BA%AB%E6%95%99-%E5%AD%B8%E6%9C%83%E5%B0%8A%E9%87%8D%E7%94%9F%E5%91%BD-092133430.html"   data-ylk="cpos:17;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:1855bf05-e469-3dc3-89f8-d077cf900c73;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:hdln;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="js-stream-content-link Mend-4">方中信盛讚教女有方 莫可欣 著重身教 學會尊重生命<u class="Stretch"></u></a>
    </h3>
    
    <p class="Mb-2">1993年嘅港姐冠軍莫可欣早前為奇妙電視節目《朝拜傲媽》擔任嘉賓，接受主持黎燕珊的訪問。與型男丈夫方中信育有一女符迦晴(方中信原名為符力)的莫可欣，曾被丈夫公開讚她教女有方，是個一百分的賢內助，莫可欣認為每個小孩有其獨特性，教育孩子並沒有殺手鐧，但由於迦晴是獨生女，她最希望女兒學懂獨立不依賴，同時也著重身教，又教囡囡學會尊重生命，不輕言放棄！</p>
    </div>
    
        <div class="Fz-xs js-stream-attribution Lhh-13 D-ib Ov-h ">
            <span class="Source Whs-nw Mend-6">Sunday Kiss</span>
            
        </div>
    
    
    
    
        <ul class="social-sharing-container Pos-a Fz-m C-w D-n End-0" data-title="方中信盛讚教女有方 莫可欣 著重身教 學會尊重生命" data-image="https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/jOpiV8RlXCwsInZSF0Asiw--/aD02NTE7dz02NDA7c209MTthcHBpZD15dGFjaHlvbg--/http://media.zenfs.com/zh-Hant-HK/homerun/sunday_kiss_359/678a1d6d7731463cde7c6a60299904d0" data-summary="1993年嘅港姐冠軍莫可欣早前為奇妙電視節目《朝拜傲媽》擔任嘉賓，接受主持黎燕珊的訪問。與型男丈夫方中信育有一女符迦晴(方中信原名為符力)的莫可欣，曾被丈夫公開讚她教女有方，是個一百分的賢內助，莫可欣認為每個小孩有其獨特性，教育孩子並沒有殺手鐧，但由於迦晴是獨生女，她最希望女兒學懂獨立不依賴，同時也著重身教，又教囡囡學會尊重生命，不輕言放棄！" data-link="https://hk.style.yahoo.com/%E6%96%B9%E4%B8%AD%E4%BF%A1%E7%9B%9B%E8%AE%9A%E6%95%99%E5%A5%B3%E6%9C%89%E6%96%B9-%E8%8E%AB%E5%8F%AF%E6%AC%A3-%E8%91%97%E9%87%8D%E8%BA%AB%E6%95%99-%E5%AD%B8%E6%9C%83%E5%B0%8A%E9%87%8D%E7%94%9F%E5%91%BD-092133430.html"><li class="D-ib Mstart-2 Cur-p"><a href="#0" class="tumblr-button Icon IconLogoTumblr C-w Td-n P-4"   data-ylk="cpos:17;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:share;g:1855bf05-e469-3dc3-89f8-d077cf900c73;ct:1;pkgt:4;sec:strm;slk:tumblr;elm:btn;elmt:sh-tbr;itc:1;"></a></li><li class="D-ib Mstart-2 Cur-p"><a href="#0" class="facebook-button Icon IconLogoFacebook C-w Td-n P-4"   data-ylk="cpos:17;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:share;g:1855bf05-e469-3dc3-89f8-d077cf900c73;ct:1;pkgt:4;sec:strm;slk:facebook;elm:btn;elmt:sh-fb;itc:1;"></a></li></ul>

<a href="https://hk.celebrity.yahoo.com/%E9%BA%A5%E7%B4%AB%E8%8E%89%E6%89%93%E6%93%82%E5%8F%B0%E5%82%B7%E8%86%9D%E7%9E%93%E4%BD%8E%E7%88%86%E5%96%8A%E9%80%81%E9%99%A2-222026063.html" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true"   data-ylk="cpos:18;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:abc92215-21ae-3bc4-9896-17abe14d6abb;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:img;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="Fl-start Mend-10 My-2 Pos-r js-stream-content-link js-stream-content-img NoTextDecoration Ov-h">

</a>

<div class="Bfc">
    <div class="Ov-h Mt-neg-1" style="max-height:5.308em;">
    
        <h3 class="Fw-b Fz-m Mb-2 Lh-115">
    
        <a href="https://hk.celebrity.yahoo.com/%E9%BA%A5%E7%B4%AB%E8%8E%89%E6%89%93%E6%93%82%E5%8F%B0%E5%82%B7%E8%86%9D%E7%9E%93%E4%BD%8E%E7%88%86%E5%96%8A%E9%80%81%E9%99%A2-222026063.html"   data-ylk="cpos:18;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:abc92215-21ae-3bc4-9896-17abe14d6abb;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:hdln;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="js-stream-content-link Mend-4">麥紫莉打擂台傷膝瞓低爆喊送院<u class="Stretch"></u></a>
    </h3>
    
    <p class="Mb-2">【東方日報專訊】【記者老詠誼日本直擊】老作到日本拍AV的麥紫莉，轉戰擂台為ViuTV拍攝節目打MMA，不過與健身教練余智嘉對戰的她，首回合已被打倒兼鎖實，之後更膝頭受傷倒地！麥紫莉嚎哭大叫表示起唔到身，連四個工作人員都抬不起她，最終送院治理。</p>
    </div>
    
        <div class="Fz-xs js-stream-attribution Lhh-13 D-ib Ov-h ">
            <span class="Source Whs-nw Mend-6">東方日報</span>
            
        </div>

<a href="https://hk.style.yahoo.com/%E8%83%A1%E8%AA%AA%E5%85%AB%E9%81%93%E7%9C%9F%E6%83%85%E5%81%87%E6%9C%9F-%E5%A4%A7%E8%82%9A%E6%9D%8F%E5%85%92%E6%9C%89-%E7%89%B9%E5%88%A5%E5%BE%85%E9%81%87-102938605.html" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true"   data-ylk="cpos:19;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:12ffffab-c9fa-3fb9-bd19-42bd535d6c47;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:img;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="Fl-start Mend-10 My-2 Pos-r js-stream-content-link js-stream-content-img NoTextDecoration Ov-h">

<div class="Bfc">
    <div class="Ov-h Mt-neg-1" style="max-height:5.308em;">
    
        <h3 class="Fw-b Fz-m Mb-2 Lh-115">
    
        <a href="https://hk.style.yahoo.com/%E8%83%A1%E8%AA%AA%E5%85%AB%E9%81%93%E7%9C%9F%E6%83%85%E5%81%87%E6%9C%9F-%E5%A4%A7%E8%82%9A%E6%9D%8F%E5%85%92%E6%9C%89-%E7%89%B9%E5%88%A5%E5%BE%85%E9%81%87-102938605.html"   data-ylk="cpos:19;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:12ffffab-c9fa-3fb9-bd19-42bd535d6c47;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:hdln;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="js-stream-content-link Mend-4">胡說八道真情假期 大肚杏兒有「特別待遇」<u class="Stretch"></u></a>
    </h3>
    
    <p class="Mb-2">由胡定欣、胡蓓蔚、胡杏兒、黃智雯、李施嬅、姚子羚組成的「胡說八道會」早前遠赴澳洲拍攝旅遊節目，而昨日 胡說八道真情假期 終於正式播出！想不到第一集就已經笑料百出，六姊妹間的「閨蜜情」也令觀眾羨慕不已！這次她們六個人卻有七顆心，杏兒佗著六個半月的大肚子拍攝，相信觀眾也看得出大家對杏兒照顧有加！現在一起欣賞節目的精彩花絮！</p>
    </div>
    
        <div class="Fz-xs js-stream-attribution Lhh-13 D-ib Ov-h ">
            <span class="Source Whs-nw Mend-6">Sunday Kiss</span>
            
        </div>

<a href="https://hk.news.yahoo.com/%E6%9E%97%E9%84%AD%E8%AB%87%E4%B8%8A%E4%BB%BB3%E5%A4%A7%E6%94%B9%E8%AE%8A-%E7%AC%91%E7%A8%B1%E9%9B%A3%E8%B2%A0%E6%93%94%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%B0%E8%A8%AD%E8%A8%88%E5%B8%AB%E6%9C%8D%E9%A3%BE-122600225.html" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true"   data-ylk="cpos:21;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:9a14ee4c-79cd-3b4b-a0cc-9d2959470c70;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:img;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="Fl-start Mend-10 My-2 Pos-r js-stream-content-link js-stream-content-img NoTextDecoration Ov-h">
    <img src="https://s.yimg.com/os/mit/ape/m/81f43c2/t.gif" width="82" height="82" alt="林鄭談上任3大改變 笑稱難負擔本地設計師服飾" class="ImageLoader" style="background-image:url('https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/ddEwfDZluSb5d1jhL3iJlA--/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMDA7cHlvZmY9MDt3PTEwMDtzbT0xO2FwcGlkPXl0YWNoeW9u/http://media.zenfs.com/en_us/News/singtao/20170921a202914.jpg')">



</a>

<div class="Bfc">
    <div class="Ov-h Mt-neg-1" style="max-height:5.308em;">
    
        <h3 class="Fw-b Fz-m Mb-2 Lh-115">
    
        <a href="https://hk.news.yahoo.com/%E6%9E%97%E9%84%AD%E8%AB%87%E4%B8%8A%E4%BB%BB3%E5%A4%A7%E6%94%B9%E8%AE%8A-%E7%AC%91%E7%A8%B1%E9%9B%A3%E8%B2%A0%E6%93%94%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%B0%E8%A8%AD%E8%A8%88%E5%B8%AB%E6%9C%8D%E9%A3%BE-122600225.html"   data-ylk="cpos:21;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:ct;g:9a14ee4c-79cd-3b4b-a0cc-9d2959470c70;ct:1;pkgt:4;elm:hdln;elmt:ct;rspns:nav;itc:0;r:P0f00000000;ccode:p_zh_hant_hk_ntk_pnr;" class="js-stream-content-link Mend-4">林鄭談上任3大改變 笑稱難負擔本地設計師服飾<u class="Stretch"></u></a>
    </h3>
    
    <p class="Mb-2">【星島日報報道】行政長官林鄭月娥在倫敦出席香港貿易發展局周年晚宴時，笑言提到上任後，有三項事情改變了。　　她說，有許多人以為她為官三十多年，慢慢爬上高位，直至現時擔任行政長官，理應駕輕就熟，沒有甚麼困難。但林鄭表示，當了行政長官，才知道有些事情不得不改變，首先是服飾。　　她表示，作為首位女性行政長官，他人會期望她衣著端莊之餘，亦要展示香港作為時裝設計中心的地位，穿著一些本地時裝設計師的服裝。 ...</p>
    </div>
    
        <div class="Fz-xs js-stream-attribution Lhh-13 D-ib Ov-h ">
            <span class="Source Whs-nw Mend-6">星島日報</span>
            
        </div>
    
    
    
    
        <ul class="social-sharing-container Pos-a Fz-m C-w D-n End-0" data-title="林鄭談上任3大改變 笑稱難負擔本地設計師服飾" data-image="https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/6s22n44bRrqMzyNYl7OKRg--/aD00MDA7dz01MDA7c209MTthcHBpZD15dGFjaHlvbg--/http://media.zenfs.com/en_us/News/singtao/20170921a202914.jpg" data-summary="【星島日報報道】行政長官林鄭月娥在倫敦出席香港貿易發展局周年晚宴時，笑言提到上任後，有三項事情改變了。　　她說，有許多人以為她為官三十多年，慢慢爬上高位，直至現時擔任行政長官，理應駕輕就熟，沒有甚麼困難。但林鄭表示，當了行政長官，才知道有些事情不得不改變，首先是服飾。　　她表示，作為首位女性行政長官，他人會期望她衣著端莊之餘，亦要展示香港作為時裝設計中心的地位，穿著一些本地時裝設計師的服裝。 ..." data-link="https://hk.news.yahoo.com/%E6%9E%97%E9%84%AD%E8%AB%87%E4%B8%8A%E4%BB%BB3%E5%A4%A7%E6%94%B9%E8%AE%8A-%E7%AC%91%E7%A8%B1%E9%9B%A3%E8%B2%A0%E6%93%94%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%B0%E8%A8%AD%E8%A8%88%E5%B8%AB%E6%9C%8D%E9%A3%BE-122600225.html"><li class="D-ib Mstart-2 Cur-p"><a href="#0" class="tumblr-button Icon IconLogoTumblr C-w Td-n P-4"   data-ylk="cpos:21;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:share;g:9a14ee4c-79cd-3b4b-a0cc-9d2959470c70;ct:1;pkgt:4;sec:strm;slk:tumblr;elm:btn;elmt:sh-tbr;itc:1;"></a></li><li class="D-ib Mstart-2 Cur-p"><a href="#0" class="facebook-button Icon IconLogoFacebook C-w Td-n P-4"   data-ylk="cpos:21;bpos:1;cat:YCUSTOM%3ATOPSTORIES;t1:a3;t2:strm;t3:share;g:9a14ee4c-79cd-3b4b-a0cc-9d2959470c70;ct:1;pkgt:4;sec:strm;slk:facebook;elm:btn;elmt:sh-fb;itc:1;"></a></li></ul>

                                        if(position === 'MAST1' && !posItem.hasErr) {
            var MastDiv = document.getElementById("my-adsMAST");
            if (MastDiv && (MastDiv.className.indexOf("D-n") < 0 || MastDiv.className.indexOf("Dn") < 0)) {
                MastDiv.className += ' D-n';
            }
            if (curAd.className.indexOf("D-n") < 0 || curAd.className.indexOf("Dn") < 0) {
                curAd.className = curAd.className.replace('D-n', '');
                curAd.className = curAd.className.replace('Dn', '');
            }
        }







                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
                
            };

                        C.onStartPosRender = function(posItem) {
                if (window.performance  && window.performance.now) {
                    var ltime = window.performance.now(),
                        posId = posItem && posItem.pos;
                    _adLT.push(['ADSTART_'+posId, Math.round(ltime)]);
                }
                if (window._isModalOpen && window._isModalOpen()) {
                    window._perfMark('ADSTART_' + posId);
                }
            };

            

                        C.onFinishPosRender = function(posId, reqList, posItem) {
                var curAd = document.getElementById("my-ads"+posId),
                    adIndex,
                    posSize = (posItem && posItem.meta && posItem.meta.value("size", "y"));

                // Get clean div for ad position in case defined
                if (posItem && posItem.conf && posItem.conf.clean) {
                    curAd = document.getElementById(posItem.conf.clean);
                }
                if (curAd) {
                    // Let ad take its original size, remove default height given to ad div
                    curAd.className = curAd.className.replace('Ht-'+ posSize, '');
                    curAd.className = curAd.className.replace('Ht-default', '');
                    curAd.parentElement.className = curAd.parentElement.className.replace(/lrec-bgcolor/, '');
                    curAd.parentElement.className = curAd.parentElement.className.replace(/lrec-before-loading/, '');

                    if(posSize && posSize != "1x1") {
                        curAd.className = curAd.className.replace('D-n', '');
                        var sponsorSlugNode = curAd.parentElement.getElementsByClassName('cslug');
                        if (sponsorSlugNode && 0 !== sponsorSlugNode.length) {
                            sponsorSlugNode[0].className = sponsorSlugNode[0].className.replace('Dn', '');
                            sponsorSlugNode[0].className = sponsorSlugNode[0].className.replace('D-n', '');
                        }
                    }
                }

                if (window.performance !== undefined && window.performance.now !== undefined) {
                    var whiteListedAds = {"LREC":"my-adsLREC-base","MAST":"my-adsMAST","LDRB":"my-adsLDRB","UBALDRB":"my-adsUBALDRB","TL1":"my-adsTL1","TXTL":"my-adsTXTL","LREC-0":"hl-ad-LREC-0","MON-0":"hl-ad-MON-0","MAST-0":"hl-ad-MAST-0","LDRB-0":"hl-ad-LDRB-0","SPL2-0":"hl-ad-SPL2-0","SPL-0":"hl-ad-SPL-0"},
                      ltime = window.performance.now();
                     _adLT.push(['ADEND_'+posId, Math.round(ltime)]);
                    setTimeout(function () {
                        if (window.YAFT !== undefined && window.YAFT.isInitialized() && whiteListedAds[posId]) {
                            // Trigger custom timing for LREC ad position
                            window.YAFT.triggerCustomTiming(whiteListedAds[posId], '', ltime);
                        }
                    },300);
                }
                if (window._isModalOpen && window._isModalOpen()) {
                    window._perfMark('ADEND_' + posId);
                    adIndex = window._pendingAds.indexOf(posId);
                    if (adIndex >= 0) {
                        window._pendingAds.splice(adIndex, 1);
                        if (window._pendingAds.length === 0) {
                            window._adRenderComplete();
                        }
                    }
                }
            };

            
                        //call back when the ad is expanded or collapsed
            C.onPosMsg = function (msg_name, data, msg_data)  {
                var visible;
                if(msg_name == "collapse" && data == "MAST") {
                    var bodyTag = document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0];
                    bodyTag.className = bodyTag.className.replace('mastAdExpanded', '');
                    bodyTag.className += " " +  "mastAdCollapsed";
                }
                if(msg_name == "exp-push" && data == "MAST") {
                    var bodyTag = document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0];
                    bodyTag.className = bodyTag.className.replace('mastAdCollapsed', '');
                    bodyTag.className += " " +  "mastAdExpanded";
                }

                /* generic ad expansion logic */
                if(msg_name == "collapse") {
                    var bodyTag = document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0];
                    bodyTag.className = bodyTag.className.replace(data + "-ad-expanded", '');
                }

                if(msg_name == "exp-ovr") {
                    var bodyTag = document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0];
                    bodyTag.className += " " + data + "-ad-expanded";
                }

                if (msg_name === 'geom-update') {
                    visible = D.render.RenderMgr.get(data).viewedAt > 0;
                    // geom-update event will always be available when Y is available
                    if (YMedia && visible) {
                        YMedia.Global.fire('ads:beacon', {id: data});
                    }
                }
                
            };

            

            


            if ("OK" == D.config(C)) {
                setTimeout(function() {
                    if (window.performance  && window.performance.now) {
                        var ltime = window.performance.now();
                        _adLT.push(['DARLA_RSTART', Math.round(ltime)]);
                    }
                    var w = window,
                        d = document,
                        e = d.documentElement,
                        g = d.getElementsByTagName('body')[0],
                        winWidth = w.innerWidth || e.clientWidth || g.clientWidth;
                    if (false && winWidth < 1024 && window.pageloadValidAds && (window.pageloadValidAds.indexOf('TL1') >= 0)) {
                        var prefetched = D.prefetched();
                        var txtlindex = prefetched.indexOf('TL1');
                        if (txtlindex >= 0) {
                            delete(prefetched[txtlindex]);
                            for (var i=0; i < prefetched.length; i++) {
                                if (prefetched.hasOwnProperty(i)) {
                                    D.render(prefetched[i]);
                                }
                            }
                        } else {
                            D.render();
                        }
                    } else {
                        D.render();
                    }
                    if (window.performance  && window.performance.now) {
                        var ltime = window.performance.now();
                        _adLT.push(['DARLA_REND', Math.round(ltime)]);
                    }
                }, 500);
            }
        }
    </script>

            if (!YMedia.config.patches || !YMedia.config.patches.length) {
                YMedia.config.patches = [
                    function patchLangBundlesRequires(Y, loader) {
                        var getRequires = loader.getRequires;
                        loader.getRequires = function (mod) {
                            var i, j, m, name, mods, loadDefaultBundle,
                                locales = Y.config.lang || [],
                                r = getRequires.apply(this, arguments);
                            // expanding requirements with optional requires
                            if (mod.langBundles && !mod.langBundlesExpanded) {
                                mod.langBundlesExpanded = [];
                                locales = typeof locales === 'string' ? [locales] : locales.concat();
                                for (i = 0; i < mod.langBundles.length; i += 1) {
                                    mods = [];
                                    loadDefaultBundle = false;
                                    name = mod.group + '-lang-' + mod.langBundles[i];
                                    for (j = 0; j < locales.length; j += 1) {
                                        m = this.getModule(name + '_' + locales[j].toLowerCase());
                                        if (m) {
                                            mods.push(m);
                                        } else {
                                            // if one of the requested locales is missing,
                                            // the default lang should be fetched
                                            loadDefaultBundle = true;
                                        }
                                    }
                                    if (!mods.length || loadDefaultBundle) {
                                        // falling back to the default lang bundle when needed
                                        m = this.getModule(name);
                                        if (m) {
                                            mods.push(m);
                                        }
                                    }
                                    // adding requirements for each lang bundle
                                    // (duplications are not a problem since they will be deduped)
                                    for (j = 0; j < mods.length; j += 1) {
                                        mod.langBundlesExpanded = mod.langBundlesExpanded.concat(this.getRequires(mods[j]), [mods[j].name]);
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                            return mod.langBundlesExpanded && mod.langBundlesExpanded.length ?
                                    [].concat(mod.langBundlesExpanded, r) : r;
                        };
                    }
            ];
        }
        for (var i = 0; i < YMedia.config.patches.length; i += 1) {YMedia.config.patches[i](YMedia, YMedia.Env._loader);}

                    Y.Global.fire('ymediaReady', {e: YMedia});
                });

                });

        <script type="text/javascript">
        YUI().use('node-base', function(Y){
                    Y.on("domready", function(e) {
            if (window.YAFT !== undefined) {
                var __yaftConfig = {
                    modules: ["applet_p_40769040","UH","applet_p_1468442","applet_p_32209491","my-adsFPL","my-adsFPAD","my-adsFPR","my-adsFPT"],
                    modulesExclude: ["my-adsMAST-base"],
                    canShowVisualReport: false,
                    useNormalizeCoverage: true,
                    includeOnlyAft2: false,
                    useNativeStartRender : true,
                    customReportModules: [],
                    
                    maxWaitTime: 6000
                };
                __yaftConfig.plugins = [];
                                __yaftConfig.plugins.push({
                    name: 'perfmarks'
                });
                
                window.YAFT.init(__yaftConfig, function(data, error) {
                    var i;
                    if (!error) {
                        try {
                                    var rapidInstance = (YMedia.My && YMedia.My.App && YMedia.My.App.getRapidTracker) ? YMedia.My.App.getRapidTracker() : null;
        if(rapidInstance) {
            var initialPageLoad = {
                AFT: Math.round(data.aft),
                AFT1: Math.round(data.aft),
                STR: data.startRender,
                VIC: data.visuallyComplete,
                PLT: data.pageLoadTime,
                DOMC: data.domElementsCount,
                HTTPC: data.httpRequests.count,
                CP: data.totalCoveragePercentage,
                NCP: data.normTotalCoveragePercentage
            };

            if(data.aftNoAd) {
                initialPageLoad.AFTNOAD = Math.round(data.aftNoAd);
            }

            var customPerfData = {},
                pagePerfData = {},
                results = [];

            var yaftResults = [0], yaftModule = '', yaftIndex = '';
            // Find costly resource time
            for (yaftModule in data.modulesReport) {
                for (yaftIndex in data.modulesReport[yaftModule].resources) {
                    yaftResults.push(Math.round(data.modulesReport[yaftModule].resources[yaftIndex].durationFromNStart));
                }
            }
            pagePerfData['COSTLY_RESOURCE'] = Math.max.apply(null, yaftResults);
            pagePerfData['X_FB1'] = 13;
            pagePerfData['X_FBN'] = 47;

            // Log ad perf data to rapid perf metric
            if (window.FPAD_rendered) {
                pagePerfData['xAFT'] = data.aft;
                pagePerfData['xPLT'] = data.pageLoadTime;
                if (window.rtFpadAdStart) {
                    pagePerfData['ADSTART_FPAD'] = Math.round(window.rtFpadAdStart);
                    if (window.rtAdStart) {
                         pagePerfData['ADCSTART_FPAD'] = Math.round(window.rtAdStart);   
                    }
                    var adEndTime = window.rtAdDone ? window.rtAdDone : (window.performance && window.performance.now && window.performance.now());
                    pagePerfData['ADEND_FPAD'] = Math.round(adEndTime);
                }
            }

            // Track ad metrics
            if ( window._adLT) {
                for (var i = 0; i< _adLT.length; i++) {
                    pagePerfData[_adLT[i][0]]  = _adLT[i][1];
                }
            }
            
            customPerfData['utm'] = pagePerfData;
            var perfData = {
                perf_commontime: {initialPageLoad: initialPageLoad},
                perf_usertime: customPerfData
            };
            rapidInstance.beaconPerformanceData(perfData);
        }
                        } catch (e) {}
                    }
               });
            }
            });
            });
      </script>


            <!-- dad Tracking -->
            
<script type="text/javascript">
function _daTRK() {
    var daTrk = '-1';
    var daFr = 0;
    var cExpiry = 0;
        if (window.pageloadNonCollapsedAds && window.pageloadNonCollapsedAds.length > 0) {
        daTrk = '0';
        for (i=0; i<window.pageloadNonCollapsedAds.length; i++) {
            var daTRKDiv = document.getElementById("my-ads" + pageloadNonCollapsedAds[i]);
            if (daTRKDiv && daTRKDiv.offsetHeight === 0) {
                daTrk = '1';
                cExpiry = 10080;
                break;
            }
        }
    } else {
        var daTRKDiv = document.getElementById("my-adsFPAD");
        if (daTRKDiv ) {
            daTrk = '0';
            if (daTRKDiv.offsetHeight === 0) {
                cExpiry = 10080;
                    daTrk = '1';
                }
            }   
        }
    if (daFr || '1' === daTrk) {
        window.thamba = 1;
    }

    YUI().use('cookie', function(Y) {

        function fireThambaEvent() {
            Y.use('event', function(YM) {
                if(YM.Cookie.exists('thamba')) {
                    var clientSideVal = parseInt(YM.Cookie.get('thamba'), 10);
                    var serverSideVal = 0;
                    if(window.rapidPageConfig && 
                        window.rapidPageConfig.rapidConfig &&
                        window.rapidPageConfig.rapidConfig.keys &&
                        window.rapidPageConfig.rapidConfig.keys.abk) {
                        var value = window.rapidPageConfig.rapidConfig.keys.abk;

                        switch(value) {
                            case 'abp':
                                serverSideVal = 2;
                                break;
                            case 'other':
                                serverSideVal = 1;
                                break;
                        }
                    }

                    if(0 === serverSideVal && clientSideVal > serverSideVal) {
                        YM.Global.fire('thamba:value-change', {"clientVal": clientSideVal, "serverVal": serverSideVal});
                    }
                }
            });
        }

        var expires = new Date();
        expires.setMinutes(expires.getMinutes() + cExpiry);
        Y.Cookie.set('thamba', daTrk, {expires: expires, domain: location.hostname});
        if (typeof window.thamba != 'undefined') {
                    var DPba=new function(){this.detect=function(px,callback){var detected=false;var checksRemain=2;var error1=false;var error2=false;if(typeof callback!="function")return;px+="?ch=*&rn=*";function beforeCheck(callback,timeout){if(checksRemain==0|| timeout>1E3)callback(checksRemain==0&&detected);else setTimeout(function(){beforeCheck(callback,timeout*2)},timeout*2)}function checkImages(){if(--checksRemain)return;detected=!error1&&error2}var random=Math.random()*11;var img1=new Image;img1.onload=checkImages;img1.onerror=function(){error1=true;checkImages()};img1.src=px.replace(/\*/,1).replace(/\*/,random);var img2=new Image;img2.onload=checkImages;img2.onerror=function(){error2=true;checkImages()};img2.src=px.replace(/\*/,2).replace(/\*/,random);beforeCheck(callback,250)}}; 
        DPba.detect("/px.gif", function(usesABP) {
            if (usesABP) {
                var expires = new Date();
                expires.setMinutes(expires.getMinutes() + 10080);
                Y.Cookie.set('thamba', '2', {expires: expires, domain: location.hostname});
                fireThambaEvent();
            }
        });
        } else {
            fireThambaEvent();
        }
    });
}

YUI().use('node','event-base', function (Y) {
    Y.on ('domready', function () {
        setTimeout(function() {window._daTRK(), 300});
    });
});

</script>
